valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Thu 22 Jan 2026 to 06:00 (UTC) on Fri 23 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low Rockall 977 losing its identity. New low expected FitzRoy 960 by same time

Rockall.text:
Wind
In southwest, northwest 5 to 7, becoming cyclonic 4 to 6, decreasing 3 at times. In northeast, easterly or southeasterly 6 to gale 8, decreasing 5 at times.
Sea state
In southwest, rough or very rough, occasionally high at first in far south and moderate later. in northeast, rough or very rough.
Weather
In southwest, rain. In northeast, rain or showers.
Visibility
In southwest, good, occasionally poor. In northeast, good, occasionally poor.
